title: Nelly Armstrong: a story of the day. By the author of “Rose Douglas” [i.e. S. R. Whitehead]
author: Armstrong, Nelly.
snippet: " Ay, Miss Mary was never intended for oneof your feckless fine ladies," said Mr. Balderstone, who observed the direction of her glance. " I have known her, as early as six o'clock inthe morning, on the top of Knochan—that'sthe high hiU immediately above the kirk;and many a time, when a mere bairn, did shegaUop on her pony as far as CauldhameFarm. Do you remember the pease bannocksand sweet mUk the gudewife used to giveyou, Miss Mary ?"
